item.title: Gerontological educational interventions for student nurses: a systematic review of qualitative findings
item.description: Article by Sherry Dahlke, Jo-Anne Rayner, Deirdre Fetherstonhaugh, Jeffrey I. Butler, Megan Kennedy DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/ijnes-2023-0042
